ClassDecl.Name: Win7ButtonStyleBase
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>The base class of all button style implementations. (Windows 7)</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Win7ButtonStyleBase
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create the style.</summary> <param name="verticalGradient">Set to true to have a vertical gradient background.</param> <param name="roundBorder">Set to true to have a round border</param> <param name="initialColor">Set to true to set the initial colors of all components for a button.</param> <param name="horizontal">Horizontal alignment for text.</param> <param name="vertical">Vertical alignment for text.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetTransparentWhenInactive
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the transparent style for the inactive state.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the background is not transparent for the inactive state.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetTransparentWhenInactive
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the transparent style for the inactive state.</summary> <param name="value">Set to troe true to make the background not transparent for the inactive state.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetTransparentWhenDisabled
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the transparent style for the disabled state.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the background is not transparent for the disabled state.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetTransparentWhenDisabled
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the transparent style for the inactive state.</summary> <param name="value">Set to troe true to make the background not transparent for the disabled state.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetAutoSizeForText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the automatically size changing state of the button.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the style automatically changes its size if the text changed.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetAutoSizeForText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the automatically size changing state of the button.</summary> <param name="value">Set to true to make the style automatically changes its size if the text changed.</param> </Document>
